pr_title: [7.x] PLANNER-2171 avoid reflection warnings + fix mvel native + upgrade to quarkus 1.8.2

timeline.message:
PLANNER-2171 avoid reflection warnings + fix mvel native + upgrade to quarkus 1.8.2
(quarkus:dev still broken)

upgrade to quarkus 1.8.2: gradle too
(quarkus:dev still broken)

timeline.bodyText: There is also the universe-bom version, but I guess it's not yet available, is it?
timeline.author: rsynek

replies.bodyText:
for now, I am leaving using the universe bom for our quickstarts of the complexity :)
We can switch to it when we figure out a good way to be able to use it reliably...
replies.author: ge0ffrey
